1.title: Hannah's Prayer
1.keyEvent: Hannah prays for a son; Samuel is born

2.title: Hannah's Song
2.keyEvent: Hannah praises God; Eli's sons are corrupt

3.title: God Calls Samuel
3.keyEvent: Samuel receives God's first prophetic call

4.title: Ark Captured
4.keyEvent: Israel defeated; Ark taken by Philistines

5.title: Ark's Plagues
5.keyEvent: Ark brings plagues on Philistine cities

7.title: Samuel Judges Israel
7.keyEvent: Samuel leads Israel to repentance and victory

8.title: Israel Demands King
8.keyEvent: Israel requests a king to rule over them

9.title: Saul Anointed King
9.keyEvent: Saul chosen and anointed as Israel's king

10.title: Saul Proclaimed King
10.keyEvent: Saul publicly declared king of Israel

12.title: Samuel's Farewell
12.keyEvent: Samuel's final address to Israel as judge

13.title: Saul's Unlawful Sacrifice
13.keyEvent: Saul disobeys God; Samuel rebukes him

14.title: Jonathan's Victory
14.keyEvent: Jonathan defeats Philistines; Saul's oath troubles

15.title: Saul Rejected
15.keyEvent: Saul disobeys God; Samuel rejects him as king

16.title: David Anointed
16.keyEvent: Samuel anoints David as future king

17.title: David and Goliath
17.keyEvent: David defeats giant Goliath with sling

18.title: David and Saul
18.keyEvent: David gains favor; Saul grows jealous

19.title: Saul Pursues David
19.keyEvent: Saul attempts to kill David; Jonathan protects him

20.title: Jonathan and David
20.keyEvent: Jonathan and David confirm covenant of friendship

21.title: David Flees to Nob
21.keyEvent: David receives consecrated bread and Goliath's sword

22.title: Saul Kills Priests
22.keyEvent: Saul orders massacre of priests at Nob

23.title: David Saves Keilah
23.keyEvent: David rescues Keilah; Saul pursues him

24.title: David Spares Saul
24.keyEvent: David spares Saul's life in cave

25.title: Nabal and Abigail
25.keyEvent: Abigail intercedes to prevent David's wrath

26.title: David Spares Saul Again
26.keyEvent: David takes Saul's spear but spares him

29.title: Philistines Reject David
29.keyEvent: Philistine leaders distrust David; send him away

31.title: Saul's Death
31.keyEvent: Saul and sons die in battle with Philistines
